name: Nvil
description:
Nvil is a polygon modeling application with rich tool sets. Its deep customization ability provides ways for user to create fast and comfortable workflow to suit individual needs.Features
  • StreamLine tools
  • Composite tools
  • User defined Windows and Hot Windows
  • Radial menus
  • Tool search
  • 3DCoat app_link
  • Hot Keys with sticky behavior
Special Notes
  • It is possible to create multiple instances of Nvil. Once Nvil is launched through Steam, it can be launched independent of Steam within a time limit of 3 days. After that, Nvil must be launched through Steam again.
